content: wyif to 2 sts before m sl1 wyib sl3 wyif sl1 through both k5 to last 5 sts k3 yo k1 twice wyib sl5 wyif to last 2 sts yo k1 twice 385 sts 429 sts row 141 b slide work back to other end of row 156 bind off row co 3 sts using cable cast needles with rs facing and using color a k to m on k2 k2tog tbl slip 3 sts back to left needle until yo k1 yo k to end of row 387 sts all sts are bound off block gently and enjoy left right
